1.类型大小 1. 基本数据类型 printf("%d
", sizeof(char)); //1 printf("%d
", sizeof(short int)); //2 printf("%d
", sizeof(int)); //4 printf("%d
", sizeof(long int)); //4 printf("%d
", sizeof(__int64)); //8 printf("%d
", sizeof(float)); //4 printf("%d

", sizeof(arr1)); //10 printf("%d
", sizeof(arr2)); //20 printf("%d
", sizeof(arr3)); //40 printf("%d
", sizeof(arr1[10]));
